item.title: [Tut] Skillcape Emotes [Tut]
item.dc:creator: @rang3i_lyf3 rang3i lyf3
item.description:
@rang3i_lyf3 wrote:

BACKUP ALL YOUR FILES FIRST!!!

Difficulty: 3/10
Source/Client: Delta Source/317 Client

Ok so this is my first tut on a good topic download the ints and animations first things here: http://www.mediafire.com/?wx7hegq20ed7mlo
Skillcape ints and animations.rar

after u got all that follow this step

Step 1: take the animations and place them into your anim folder (most anim folders are in your cache folder)

Step 2: place the ints at the beginning of your client.java folder in your source file

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
public void SkillCape() {
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4319) { //attack
stillgfx(711, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4959);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2677) { //attack untrimmed
stillgfx(711, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4959);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4339) { //herblore
stillgfx(726, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4969);
sM(“You Do your Skillcape emote.”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2707) { //herblore untrimmed
stillgfx(726, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4969);
sM(“You Do your Skillcape emote.”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4317) { //agility
stillgfx(725, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4977);
sM(“You Do your Skillcape emote.”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2704) { //agility untrimmed
stillgfx(725, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4977);
sM(“You Do your Skillcape emote.”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4359) { //strength
stillgfx(714, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4981);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

playerLevel[0] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]);
playerLevel[0] += 1;
sendFrame126(""+playerLevel[0]+"", 4016);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2680) { //strength untrimmed
stillgfx(714, absY, absX);
setAnimation(4981);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

}

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4329) { //Defence
stillgfx(721, absY, absX);

setAnimation(4961);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2683) { //Defence untrimmed
stillgfx(721, absY, absX);

setAnimation(4961);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

}
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4341) { //hp

setAnimation(4971);
sM(“You Do your skillcape emote”);

}

}

right under ur public class client extends Player implements Runnable’s
then compile your server to make sure u got it also do it with ur client

Step 3: Last step to make the command (the reason i use the command is because i dont know how to hard code cant get the interface to work lol o well well heres the command)

} if(command.startsWith("skillcape")){ SkillCape(); }
simple command lol

if any problems add my msn ill be more than happy to help u Pokanoob@hotmail.com
or if i forgot anything msg me please i no that some of my tut is not correct
thanks
